reviews.review: Muy buen juego, entretenido, variado, un poco viejo, pero sigue siendo imprescindible.

Mentioning Half-Life means talking about an important franchise within the industry. With a first game released in 1998 and several sequels and spin-offs, he left his fans in a state of suspense as the doubts raised in his last official chapter, Half-Life 2: Episode 2, were not resolved. Valve left the Side mark to dedicate itself to other things and has kept at bay any related projects; This has led to any advertisement that is a cause of anxiety for fans who have decided to revive it in different ways, including creating their own video games as expansions or remakes, something that does not happen frequently.


The game itself, for me you do not go out of style, is a classic and I still like and keep playing.10 / 10

It feels almost like its needed to buy this game if you have a steam account, if not, you would be missing out on some of the best content on the steam store, this game changed video games more than Call of Duty 4 and reshaped how we tell a video game story, its action packed, immersive, filled with environment and characters, it feels almost like a movie, I couldn't in my right mind tell you not to get this game, it is a must have, especially at its current price.
The best of the best. Legendary FPS. My brother showed me this over 10 years ago and my mind was blown, it's insanely good. If you have not played this game you are really missing out
A good game with great graphics for its release date, but when it comes to enemy concept and weapons the first Half-Life  was better in comparison.
